skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Tzeentch, and is affected by Tzeentch Authority.

enabled_if: Winds of magic power is 15 or greater

skillTree.localised_description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Tzeentch, and is affected by Tzeentch Authority.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.
Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death (300)

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Pink Horrors
Summons a unit of Pink Horrors

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Gate of Tzeentch"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Pink Horrors

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +2 for "Gate of Tzeentch"

skillTree.localised_description: With just a wave of the hand, projectiles fired at this servant of Tchar are turned from sharp and pointy to soft and entirely harmless.

effects.description:
Enemy miscast base chance: +10%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy miscast base chance: +10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Perhaps it is the Fly Lord's apparent nonchalance that enrages Tzeentch so? Whatever the reason, the Great Game's greatest player, and his greatest servant, have an adversary on which to focus their ire.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Nurglish factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Nurglish factions

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: The warhost seeks glories for the Dark Gods, erecting perverse monuments to earn their favor.
All manner of terrible, twisted artifacts can be found.
No price is too small for the Gods.

effects.description:
Character experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

Character experience gain per turn: +200
	(Lord's army)

Character experience gain per turn: +300
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The southern races are weak. Their souls and monuments will be offered to the Gods in equal measure!

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: There is a price to all things, a cost which has been determined by the Gods and will be exacted from those with the courage to strike a deal.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.
My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: I can procure anything an agent might need for any mission.
I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!
We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Tzeentch corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Tzeentch corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Tzeentch corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Tzeentch, and is affected by Tzeentch Authority.

enabled_if: Winds of magic power is 15 or greater

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
Blessed with the transformative boons of Tzeeneth, this one can travel further by his feathered wings, whether they be figurative or literal.
This one has become the conduit through which the Great Conspirator weaves His sorcerous webs, affecting glorious Change through magical means.

effects.description:
Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +10%
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one seeks to sow the seeds of confusion, dissent and dishonesty, for such are the insidious ways of the Changer.

effects.description:
Enemy spell resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in province)

Enemy missile resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Are you the Gatekeeper?"

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Magic is everywhere, endless waves.

effects.description:
Cooldown: -10% to all spells
	(own armies in province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Nothing can pass through.
Twisted magic never stops.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What are we? Your scholars claim we exist only to tempt you, yet in a very real way we are you.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Winds gather.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +2 per turn
	(all units in army)
